Help Menu

 Bill: Enter your bill value.
 Tip: This your tip dollar value to be added to your total.
 Total: This is your total including tip.


Add Record:
Will take you to another fragment where additional information about your tip will be collected and stored.


ViewRecord:
Will take you another fragment where you an view passed stored tips.


Help:
Will bring you to this fragment.


Quick Tips
 The Quick Tip buttons are for fast and easy tip calculations. Clicking any of the five percentage increments will automatically calculate your tip (dollar-value) and apply it to the new total.


Custom Tip
 Here you can adjust the percentage of your tip by increments of 1 percent. going below 0% is not permitted.
